trans-unit.source: Enable Automatic Mode: When the page module says "connected", then fallback mode will be used. If it says "free", free mode will be used.
This will change system wide language handling for this page in this language only. This value will set the legacy sys_language_mode handling for this page only, no inheritance. Use with care!
Automatic: Uses "Fallback" if the page module says Connected Mode and "Free" if the page module says Free Mode.
Default: Uses the global default setting for this language
Strict: Show only translated content, based on overlays
Fallback: Show default language if no translation exists
Free mode: Ignore translation and overlay concept, only show data from selected language
